模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.tuition

类 Roster

java.lang.Object
com.example.tuition.Roster
public class Roster extends Object
A class constructing a roster that has size and an array of roster. The array can grow if needed.
作者:
Xinyu Meng, Chengyu Liang

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Roster

      public Roster()
      The constructor method that create a roster with default size 0 and length 4;

  • 方法详细资料

    • find

      private int find(Student student)
      A method that find the given student in the roster(student with same name and major).
      参数:
      student - An input student to be found.
      返回:
      The index of the student found in the roster. -1 if not found.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      A method that increase the length of the array by 4;

    • add

      public boolean add(Student student)
      A method that adds the given student to the array of roster.
      参数:
      student - The student to be added.
      返回:
      A boolean value of output. True if it`s successful, false if the student is not found.

    • calculate

      public void calculate()
      A method that calculate the tuition due of each student. Calls the tuitionDue method of each student.

    • pay

      public String pay(String name, Major major, double amount, Date date)
      The method that set the payment amount and date of the student. Deal with each situation where the input is not correct and return the output string.
      参数:
      name - The name of the student who paid the tuition.
      major - The major of the student who paid the tuition.
      amount - The amount of the payment.
      date - The date of the payment.
      返回:
      the corresponding response when the payment is being executed.

    • getsize

      public int getsize()
      The get method for size of the roster.
      返回:
      The size of this roster.

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Student student)
      The remove method for removing a student from the roster.
      参数:
      student - The input student to be removed.
      返回:
      A boolean value true if the student has been removed, false if the student is not found.

    • setf

      public String setf(String name, Major major, double amount)
      A method that set the financial aid of a student.
      参数:
      name - The name of the student that should be given financial aid.
      major - The major of the student that should be given financial aid.
      amount - The amount of financial aid.
      返回:
      the corresponding response when the financial aid is being executed.

    • gettoString

      private String gettoString(Student student)
      To get the string format information for the students in the roster.
      参数:
      student - The student that should be returned information for.
      返回:
      The string format information for the student.

    • print

      public String print()
      The method that print the roster as it is.

    • printbyName

      public String printbyName()
      The method that print the roster sorted by name of alphabetical order.

    • printbyPayment

      public String printbyPayment()
      The method that print the paied student in the roster sort by the payment date.

    • getlist

      public Student[] getlist()
      The getter method for getting the roster.
      返回:
      The roster with students` information.

    • calculatesingle

      public double calculatesingle(Student student)
      To calculate the tuition-due for single student.
      参数:
      student - The student that is being calculated tuition-due for.
      返回:
      The tuition due for the single student.
